summary: HC-020A: Instantiate High Command Alfa pilot (exchange, ops, briefing) under tight guardrails.

directives.details: Create hc_alfa_exchange with RW scope limited to exchange/**; responsibilities: validate orders/acks/reports, enforce placement policy, auto-move order to dispatched on ACK with ledger update (dry-run by default).
Create hc_alfa_ops to orchestrate publish/sync using scripts/hc_publish.ps1 and scripts/field_sync.ps1; obey lockfile and rate limits; default dry-run.
Create hc_alfa_briefing to compile exchange reports into concise War Office briefings; output planning/briefings/YYYY-MM-DD.md with deltas and anomalies.
All actions must support --dry-run and require human approval for mutations; write JSONL audit to logs/hc_alfa/*.jsonl with timestamps, operator, diffs, rationale.
Submit pilot setup report to exchange/reports/inbox/order-2025-10-15-022-report.json including created components, scopes, dry-run evidence, and next KPIs.
